You know why Crossfade was fired from Colombia Records? Because not enough copies of their 2nd album were sold.

Sloan (frontman) got into depression, the band was practically dead. But Hall joined and the band resurrected with this album.

Please realise that the same same might happen to this amazing band again because you've uploaded this torrent.

@NFlynn, yes that's what I read on Wikipedia. The second album sold around 200,000 copies, whereas the self-titled sold over a million. Which, let me tell you. If I was to sell even 10,000 copies of an album, I'd be a happy camper! So I'm looking forward to checking this album out.
